abstract: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts hosts 'Wikipedia! The Musical!', six-hour 'editathon' in which amateur editors have chance to update the musical-theater entries in Wikipedia using the library's special collections.
snippet: “Wikipedia! The Musical!,” at the New York Public Library for the Performing Arts on Saturday, is intended to improve that Web site’s entries related to musical theater.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts

lead_paragraph: “Wikipedia! The Musical!,” at the New York Public Library for the Performing Arts on Saturday, is intended to improve that Web site’s entries related to musical theater.
